original_title: たわわなときめき あなたの人生変わるかも
overview: Film director Karen is invited by his childhood friend Sudo, a famous film director, to film a movie in Mexico. Karen is surprised and delighted by the suddenness, but feels something is wrong and blurs her words. Her best friend Aya, who was taught by her girlfriend to live freely, was dissatisfied with her inarticulate appearance.
title: Tawawana tokimeki: Anata no jinsei kawaru kamo
